statements: SELECT customer_id, customer_name, billing_date, service_type, total_usage, total_billing_amount FROM telecommunication_company_billing;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, total_billing_amount, service_type, total_usage, billing_date FROM telecommunication_company_billing;
SELECT * FROM telecommunication_company_billing WHERE customer_id = 100;
SELECT customer_name, total_billing_amount FROM telecommunication_company_billing WHERE billing_date = '2022-01-15';
SELECT customer_name, service_type, total_usage, total_billing_amount FROM telecommunication_company_billing WHERE total_usage > 1000;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, billing_date, service_type, total_usage, total_billing_amount FROM telecommunication_company_billing;
SELECT * FROM telecommunication_company_billing WHERE customer_id = 1001;
SELECT customer_name, service_type, total_billing_amount FROM telecommunication_company_billing WHERE billing_date = '2022-01-31';
SELECT * FROM telecommunication_company_billing WHERE customer_id = 1002 AND service_type = 'Internet';
SELECT customer_name, total_usage, total_billing_amount FROM telecommunication_company_billing WHERE total_billing_amount > 100.00 ORDER BY total_billing_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM billing_info WHERE customer_id = 123;
SELECT customer_id, billing_date FROM billing_info WHERE service_type = 'Internet';
SELECT billing_date, customer_id, service_type FROM billing_info ORDER BY billing_date DESC;
SELECT usage_details FROM billing_info WHERE billing_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT service_type, SUM(revenue) AS total_revenue FROM revenue_streams GROUP BY service_type;
SELECT * FROM billing_info WHERE customer_id = 100;
SELECT billing_date, service_type FROM billing_info ORDER BY billing_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, billing_date FROM billing_info WHERE service_type = 'Internet' AND usage_details LIKE '%GB%';
SELECT * FROM billing_info JOIN revenue_streams ON billing_info.service_type = revenue_streams.service_type;
SELECT DISTINCT service_type FROM billing_info UNION SELECT service_type FROM revenue_streams;
SELECT * FROM billing_information;
SELECT billing_id, customer_id, billing_date FROM billing_information ORDER BY billing_date DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT customer_id FROM billing_information;
SELECT * FROM revenue_streams WHERE revenue_amount > 1000;
SELECT provider_id, provider_name FROM service_providers ORDER BY provider_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM billing_information WHERE billing_amount > 1000 ORDER BY billing_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, billing_amount FROM billing_information WHERE billing_date = '2022-01-15';
SELECT provider_name, provider_location FROM service_providers ORDER BY provider_name;
SELECT * FROM revenue_streams WHERE revenue_amount BETWEEN 5000 AND 10000;
SELECT provider_name, service_type FROM service_providers JOIN revenue_streams ON service_providers.provider_id = revenue_streams.stream_id;
SELECT * FROM billing_customers;
SELECT customer_name, billing_amount FROM billing_customers WHERE billing_amount > 1000;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, billing_amount FROM billing_customers ORDER BY billing_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM billing_transactions WHERE transaction_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT service_name, SUM(revenue_amount) AS total_revenue FROM revenue_analysis GROUP BY service_name ORDER BY total_revenue DESC;
SELECT * FROM billing_customers WHERE customer_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT customer_name, billing_amount FROM billing_customers WHERE billing_amount > 1000 ORDER BY billing_amount DESC;
SELECT customer_name, service_name, transaction_date FROM billing_customers JOIN billing_transactions ON billing_customers.customer_id = billing_transactions.customer_id;

SELECT service_name, SUM(transaction_amount) AS total_revenue FROM billing_services JOIN billing_transactions ON billing_services.service_id = billing_transactions.service_id GROUP BY service_name ORDER BY total_revenue DESC;
SELECT analysis_date, revenue_amount FROM revenue_analysis WHERE revenue_amount > 5000;
SELECT * FROM billing_information;
SELECT billing_date, amount FROM billing_information WHERE billing_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT service_name, subscription_fee FROM services_5g WHERE subscription_fee > 50.00;
SELECT revenue_id, stream_name, revenue_amount FROM revenue_streams ORDER BY revenue_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM billing_information;
SELECT customer_id, billing_date, amount FROM billing_information WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT customer_id, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM billing_information GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT * FROM revenue_streams ORDER BY revenue_amount DESC;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_name LIKE 'A%';
